textAfterTable: » Revealing/Reflecting Cost of Goods Sold To reflect/reveal the cost of goods sold, the value of closing stock is to be deducted from the total value of goods. Thus the value of closing stock has to be credited to the "Trading a/c" which has the total value of goods/stock existing in it as a debit balance.
